Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add core SDK structure and authentication

Implemented:
- Config struct with validation
- Error types and wrapping
- Common types and enums \(TaskStatus, IntegrityLevel, etc.\)
- Client struct with GraphQL integration
- Authentication: Login\(\), CreateAPIToken\(\), GetMe\(\)
- Token refresh and session management
- Request authentication with headers

Files:
- pkg/mythic/config.go
- pkg/mythic/errors.go  
- pkg/mythic/types/common.go
- pkg/mythic/client.go
- pkg/mythic/auth.go

Dependencies added:
- github.com/hasura/go-graphql-client@v0.10.0

Code compiles successfully with `go build ./pkg/mythic/...`

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add CI/CD workflows and linting configuration

GitHub Actions workflows:
- test.yml: Lint, test, and build on push/PR
  - Matrix testing: Go 1.21, 1.22, 1.23
  - Multi-OS: Ubuntu, macOS, Windows
  - Code coverage upload to Codecov
  - Verify go.mod is tidy

- integration.yml: Integration tests against live Mythic
  - Scheduled daily runs
  - Manual trigger support
  - Docker Compose setup for test Mythic instance
  - Artifact upload on failure

Configuration:
- .golangci.yml: Comprehensive linter configuration
  - 13 linters enabled \(errcheck, gosimple, govet, etc.\)
  - gosec for security scanning
  - Test-specific exclusions

Integration test infrastructure:
- tests/integration/docker-compose.yml
  - Mythic server, PostgreSQL, RabbitMQ
  - Isolated test network
  - Persistent volumes

Coverage: 36.4% \(baseline for core types and config\)

ðŸ¤– Generated with Claude Code

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
